name: Check-in-London
tag_list: london, accommodation, apartments, short-stay-rentals, holiday-apartments, aparthotels, extended-stay-hotels, city-breaks
overview:
Check-in-London.com is a London accommodation specialist for serviced apartment rentals for short stays, leisure holidays, corporate lets and relocations from one night to many months. We offer you a wide range of serviced apartments in London from studios, one, two, three and four bedroom apartments to suit every taste and budget.

Our office is based in Central London with a team of friendly and helpful staff who have vast experience and in-depth knowledge of London Serviced Apartments. We charge No Booking Fees and guarantee you the Lowest Price possible on all the Serviced Apartments we offer on our site.

Local Expertise Our local expertise is unrivalled as we only focus on London properties bringing you the best selection of Serviced Apartments in unbeatable locations. Our knowledgeable staff are based in Central London and invest time and resources to bring you great deals and fantastic apartments to choose from.

Outstanding Value for Money We guarantee you the Lowest Price possible for all our Serviced Apartments along with the Latest Special Offers and Discounts and offer you a FREE and Impartial service with an aim to meet all your accommodation requirements. We also help you negotiate discounts for long stays or group bookings * subject to availability.

Our Personal Touch We offer a unique personal service to understand your needs better and we are willing to go the extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction making it easy for you to find just what you are looking for. We maintain a respectful and professional relationship built on honesty and reliability with our suppliers, partners and customers.

Simple & Secure Bookings Our website is designed with you in mind so that you can find all the information you require to book your accommodation without any hassle. We use the latest SSL technology ensuring that your information is stored safely and securely when processing your booking.
